exec: pm.expect(pm.response.to.have.body('Table name must be a lowercase ASCII string between 1 and 255 characters in length. Allowed punctuation characters are -.:@_ and the table name may not start with a single underscore character. An example of a valid table name would be \'review:testcustomer\'.'));

item.name: Create/update/delete a piece of data in sor by applying a delta POST /sor/1/{table}/{key}
TC: Request without api-key

request.description:

 applying a delta.  Expects a delta in the format produced by the
 {@link Deltas} class and {@link Delta#toString()}.

item.name: Attempts to reduce the size of the specified content in sor POST /sor/1/{table}/{key}/compact
TC: Request without api-key
Attempts to reduce the size of the specified content in the underlying storage.

request.description:
Attempts to reduce the size of the specified content in the underlying storage.
 Normally compaction occurs automatically as a side effect of performing a
 {@link #get}, but it can be forced to occur using this method.

request.description: Retrieves a list of content items in a particular table. To retrieve all items in a table set the limit param to a very large value (eg. Long.MAX_VALUE), but for large tables be sure your client can stream the results without exhausting all available memory.

item.name: Drops a table

request.description: Returns a SuccessResponse if table is dropped

item.description: Request with api-key which has  sor|read|{table} permission to the table which exists returns: List of items in the table (deleted items are not included in the result)

request.description: Returns a SuccessResponse if table is created

                    " version of the content, if it exists.  Expects a literal JSON representation\n" +
                    " of the object."

item.name: Imports an arbitrary size stream of deltas and/or JSON objects POST /sor/1/{table}
TC: Request import an arbitrary size of stream of JSON
Creates table /sor/1/_table/{table}

request.description: Returns a SuccessResponse if table is created

item.name: Imports an arbitrary size stream of deltas and/or JSON objects.

request.description:
Imports an arbitrary size stream of deltas and/or JSON objects.  Two formats are supported: array syntax
 ('[' object ',' object ',' ... ']') and whitespace-separated objects (object whitespace object whitespace ...)
 Each piece of content must have a top-level "~id" attribute that determines the object key in the SoR.

exec: * Waits until the given predicate returns a truthy value. Calls and awaits the predicate
* function at the given interval time. Can be used to poll until a certain condition is true.
* await waitUntil(() => element.someAsyncProperty, 'element should become ready');
* @param {() => boolean | Promise<boolean>} predicate - predicate function which is called each poll interval.
*   The predicate is awaited, so it can return a promise.
* @param {string} [message] an optional message to display when the condition timed out
* @param {{ interval?: number, timeout?: number }} [options] timeout and polling interval
